And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
And save the access token in the response which is located inside the JSON Path of "$.data"

messages: Successfully saved the access token into the text file in the directory of "C:\Users\onimalarathna\IdeaProjects\MaxSoft-IntelliAPI\resources/access_tokens/saved_valid_access_token.txt"

items.stepText: And the user saves the values inside data stores as follows

messages: "http://aggregationservice-pearson-prep-us1-stg-blue.bite.pearsondev.tech/api/questions?deckId=5badc2027246d600100fe269" is successfully saved as a text in Scenario Data Store [invokingEndpoint]
